item.title: Collecting Spotify data with R
item.description: This post is part of a series of posts to analyse the digital me. Collecting Spotify data with R Spotify has made its data very accessible to endusers to play with. Their API provides you with a plethora of options to get to their data, which is a ton of fun to analyse. To get started, you wil need to R packages to access the data and process it afterwards.
